text: snap is now selling their spectacles, i hope there is a teardown soon

attachments.title: Spectacles by Snap Inc.
attachments.text: Spectacles are sunglasses that Snap! Tap once to make a memory â€” from your perspective. Then, relive it later in Snapchat.

text: In this months Fast Company article they described Snap as a way to run your own 24 hour news channel. Which is probably why I don't like it hahah
back when Google Glass was still a thing, many of the Explorers at meetups were eager to do that sort of thing (but were constrained by the short battery life of Glass, heh)
